column4: I want to backup a 750GB hard_disk (with only 20GB occupied)  - and restore it in a smaller hard disk (300 GB hard disk) - what should I use? partimage requires at least equal hard disk with the original
or the GUI version of rsync, grsync
so if I want to backup the disk with the operating system - should I boot with a live system - Knoppix or somehting
ive never done whole-disk backup, so im prolly not the one to ask about that :D
